sections.title: Ability Damage and Drain

sections.description: Rules for special attacks that cause ability damage or permanent ability drain

sections.description: Third party rule allowing additional immediate actions per turn

sections.description: Ability to see in all directions simultaneously, preventing flanking

sections.description: Third party ability to automatically know location of creatures entering controlled planes

sections.description: Third party ability to extend senses over long distances

sections.description: Mythic ability granting initiative bonuses and extra standard actions

sections.description: Immunity to precision damage and critical hits due to malleable body

sections.description: Ability to survive indefinitely on land despite having aquatic subtype

sections.description: Horseman ability to resurrect after death with restrictions

sections.description: Complete set of abilities and immunities possessed by archdevils

sections.description: Ability to automatically latch onto targets after successful attacks

sections.description: Wounds that continue to deal damage each round until healed

sections.description: Nonvisual sense that notices creatures but doesn't negate concealment

sections.description: Advanced nonvisual sense that functions as well as normal sight

sections.description: Third party ability to block other entities' sensing abilities

sections.description: Involuntary rage triggered by taking damage in combat

sections.description: Fire damage that can cause targets to catch fire and continue burning

sections.description: Ability to move through spaces much smaller than normal size

sections.description: Specific curse that transforms humanoids into lycanthropes

sections.description: Ability to see clearly in total darkness in black and white

sections.title: Disease
sections.description: Ability to inflict diseases on contacted creatures

sections.description: Ability to nauseate creatures damaged by the monster

sections.description: Third party sense using sound reflection like echolocation

sections.description: Aura that disrupts spells with emotion components

sections.description: Extended ability to hold breath before risking drowning

sections.description: Abilities possessed by powerful unique qlippoth lords

sections.description: Mythic ability for enhanced rest and recovery

sections.description: Ability to reduce specific types of damage by a fixed amount

sections.description: Ability for large creatures to catch thrown rocks as reflex saves

sections.description: Racial bonus to attack rolls when hurling rocks and stones

sections.description: Third party sense detecting thermal differences like heat vision

sections.description: Ability to detect, locate, and track creatures by smell

sections.description: Perfect vision in any darkness including magical darkness

sections.description: Ability to perfectly imitate sounds and voices

sections.description: Ability to divide into two identical copies when damaged by certain attacks

sections.description: Offensive odor that sickens nearby creatures

sections.description: Inability to attack and staggered condition in sunlight

sections.description: Third party enhanced scent ability using smell and taste

sections.description: Mental communication with creatures that have languages

sections.description: Sensitivity to ground vibrations to pinpoint creature locations

sections.description: Aura that makes animals reluctant to approach

sections.description: Increased damage or penalties from specific energy types or effects

sections.description: Ability to breathe underwater indefinitely while using abilities
